title: server problems
body: riot, honestly something is going on with your servers. everyone i run into all complain about lag and say the same thing. And just now, i got into champ select and when the top laner on my team was locking it the timer hit 0 and then froze there and shortly after it came to normal and i saw the timer hit 0 and i got kicked and it say i didnt lock in and was forced to wait 15 bloody minutes. like really this is insane.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any logged server issues as of recent. The issue you're describing is fairly common when your client cannot keep a stable connection to the server. The most common solutions are outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and is a great place to start with this.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.
